head.citation-title: Translation UML activity diagram into colored Petri net with inscription
head.abstracts: © 2016 IEEE.UML activity diagram is widely used to describe the behavior of the software system. Unfortunately, there is still no practical tool to verify the UML diagrams automatically. This paper proposes an alternative to translate UML activity diagram into a colored petri nets with inscription. The model translation rules are proposed to guide the automatic translation of the activity diagram with atomic action into a CPN model. Moreover, the relevant basic arc inscriptions are generated without manual elaboration. The resulting CPN with inscription is correctly verified as expected.
